nodes.text: The Veragi sector was a sector located within the Tingel Arm adjacent to the Dalonbian sector. It surrounded and included the Gree Enclave.
During the Imperial Period, the Gree Enclave had became a subsector of the Veragi sector and was ruled by its own Moff.
In 25 ABY, the Veragi sector was one of the first sectors invaded by the Yuuzhan Vong.
